record.dc:title: 30MM30, 15MM30, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. 105R Profile.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: Under the moat was a humus zone and a zone of dark muck. There was a clay zone over the humus on the built-up ring. The clay fill was of recent times. Note end of plank protruding from humus underneath clay. On each side of the clay muck material and at higher level were areas of hard and deeper red clay.
